title: How the Crypto Industry’s Political Spending Is Paying Off
description: Federal lawmakers who benefited from crypto largess in the 2024 election are speedily advancing the industry’s agenda.

title: Why security culture is crypto’s strongest asset
description: In this Help Net Security interview, Norah Beers, CISO at Grayscale, discusses key security challenges in managing crypto assets, adversary tactics, private key management, and securing both hot and cold wallets. From a threat modeling perspective, what unique adversary tactics do you see in the crypto space that don’t often appear in traditional finance? The adversaries themselves aren’t fundamentally different between traditional finance and the crypto industry, but certain of the tactics they employ are … More →The post Why security culture is crypto’s strongest...
